ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: I am an Erudite so this may not apply to DE s, but the gypsies in NK are indifferent.  They have a camp in the center of the zone where a few roads come
ygData.messageBody:
I am an Erudite so this may not apply to DE's, but the gypsies in NK are
indifferent. They have a camp in the center of the zone where a few roads
come together. You could probably sell to the Centaur and Aviak merchants
in SK, but Im pretty sure that they don't have any food or water.

Dicey

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Peterson [mailto:nicknack@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 28, 1999 11:34 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 211


From: "Michael Peterson" <nicknack@...>

Greetings dark brothers and sisters,

I am a 16th level DE Necro on Tunare, and I am considering moving my hunting
grounds to the west of Highpass (i.e. into the Karanas), with special
interest in the Gnoll Reaver spawn in EK. I was wondering if anyone knew of
any vendors in the Karanas (other that the centaurs in EK) that will deal
with me, particularly to sell food/water

(Any tips on hunting spots also happily accepted)
--Nergal

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
